train.name: Ticket to ride
train.description: Ticket to Ride is a cross-country train adventure in which players collect and play matching train cards to claim railway routes connecting cities through continent

uno.name: Uno
uno.description: UNO is a multi-player card game in which the objective is to be the first player to get rid of all the cards in their hand

thousand.name: Thousand - 1000
thousand.description: The goal is go get in the end more than 1000 points, first player to achieve overall (sum-up) of 1000 points wins the game

rummy.name: Rummy
rummy.description: Rummy is the popular family game of strategy and luck! Players try to be the first to play all of the tiles in their rack by placing them in runs and groups, rummy style. Reinforces STEM skills like sequencing and pattern recognition

analytics.name: Analytics
analytics.byWinsToGames: Raiting by wins to played games

profile.telegramSetupDescription: Search in Telegram for 'pointsResultBot' and subscribe using this codes

common.finishGameQuestion: Are you sure you want to finish game?
common.leaveGameQuestion: Are you sure you want to leave game?
